document.full_text: mr. schlafly, an electrical engineer, formed the teleprompter corporation with two colleagues after 20th century fox declined to invest in their device.
document.title: hubert schlafly, who helped build teleprompter, is dead at 91
lines_and_colors: mr. schlafly, an electrical engineer, formed the teleprompter corporation with two colleagues after 20th century fox declined to invest in their device.
